title: Generic sans serif
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140710060633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a-plastering_5271.jpg)

I know this one but can't think of its name right now ...

Thanks in advance!
author: 5star

comments.content:
As close as I can get:  
Cousine  
Liberation Mono  
Inconsolata Medium  
But they are only in the ballpark - not the exact font - unless it has been spread as well as letter spaced.
